reviewText: What is really odd is the DVD cover art is actually from Steve Reeve's film "The Slave-Son Of Spartacus". That's Mr. Reeves with the sword. So is it Gordon Scott or Steve Reeves in this film?
good old gladiator movie plenty of action picture quality fairly good and sound for its time  other gladiator movies hercules samson
sadly this item belongs to one of those "most of the sword-and-sandal movies that are available on DVD are panned-and-scanned, and typically are of poor image quality". not recommanded.
